feature -- Status report
f_is_selectable../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_is_selectableis_selectable: FalseBOOLEAN -- May the tree item be selected. do Result := ../implementation_interface/ev_item_i.xml#f_parentparent /= Void end
feature -- Element Change
f_pixmap../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Result is pixmap displayed in Current. -- We do not simply return ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap as -- the image must be stretched to fit the size allocated -- by ../implementation_interface/ev_item_i.xml#f_parentparent. do if attached ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap as l_internal_pixmap then Result := l_internal_pixmap.Falsetwin if attached ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp as l_parent_imp and then l_internal_pixmap.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_widthwidth /= l_parent_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler_i.xml#f_pixmaps_widthpixmaps_width and then l_internal_pixmap.../interface/ev_positioned.xml#f_heightheight /= l_parent_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler_i.xml#f_pixmaps_heightpixmaps_height then Result.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_stretchstretch (l_parent_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler_i.xml#f_pixmaps_widthpixmaps_width, l_parent_imp.../implementation_interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler_i.xml#f_pixmaps_heightpixmaps_height) end end end
f_internal_pixmap../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_internal_pixmapinternal_pixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Pixmap used at the start of the row.
f_parent_imp../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_parent_impparent_imp: detachable ../implementation_gtk/ev_multi_column_list_imp.xmlEV_MULTI_COLUMN_LIST_IMP -- Parent implementation of Current. deferred end
f_tooltip../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_tooltiptooltip: FalseSTRING_32 -- Tooltip displayed on Current. deferred end
feature -- Element change
f_set_tooltip../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_set_tooltipset_tooltip (a_tooltip: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL) -- Assign a_tooltip to ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_tooltiptooltip. require a_tooltip_not_void: a_tooltip /= Void deferred end
f_remove_tooltip../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_remove_tooltipremove_tooltip -- Make ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_tooltiptooltip empty. do ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_set_tooltipset_tooltip ("") ensure tooltip_removed: ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_tooltiptooltip.Falseis_empty end
feature -- Contract support
f_pixmap_equal_to../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_pixmap_equal_topixmap_equal_to (a_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is a_pixmap equal to ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap? local scaled_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP multi_column_list: detachable ../interface/ev_multi_column_list.xmlEV_MULTI_COLUMN_LIST do if ../implementation_interface/ev_item_i.xml#f_parentparent /= Void then scaled_pixmap := a_pixmap.Falsetwin multi_column_list ?= ../implementation_interface/ev_item_i.xml#f_parentparent check multi_column_list /= Void then end scaled_pixmap.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_stretchstretch (multi_column_list.../interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler.xml#f_pixmaps_widthpixmaps_width, multi_column_list.../interface/ev_item_pixmap_scaler.xml#f_pixmaps_heightpixmaps_height) else scaled_pixmap := a_pixmap end Result := attached ../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap as l_pixmap and then scaled_pixmap.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (l_pixmap) end
feature {../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xmlEV_MULTI_COLUMN_LIST_ROW} -- Implementation
f_on_item_added_at../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_on_item_added_aton_item_added_at (an_item: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL; item_index: FalseINTEGER_32) -- an_item has been added to index item_index. deferred end
f_on_item_removed_at../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_on_item_removed_aton_item_removed_at (an_item: FalseREADABLE_STRING_GENERAL; item_index: FalseINTEGER_32) -- an_item has been removed from index item_index. deferred end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_multi_column_list_row_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_multi_column_list_row.xmlEV_MULTI_COLUMN_LIST_ROW note option: stable attribute end
